data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Kalahandi, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kalahandi, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 17,346 believers in Kalahandi, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kalahandi, Odisha, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,576,900 souls in Kalahandi and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Kalahandi, Odisha, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Bhumia people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Bhumia people know you.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,576,900 citizens of the the county of Kalahandi.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Kalahandi that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Kalahandi, Odisha, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: Kalahandi
location.people_groups_list: Rosa, Muli, Bondo Poraja, Dora, Kuruni
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rosa (36,000), Muli (20,000), Bondo Poraja (12,000), Dora (8,200), Kuruni (400)
